title: ExecutionStatus
description: Status of the most recent, including any current, execution of a document node.

type.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@type` keyword.

id.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@id` keyword.

identifiers.description: Any kind of identifier for any kind of Thing.
identifiers.$comment:
Some identifiers have specific properties e.g the `issn` property for
the `Periodical` type. These should be used in preference to this
property which is intended for identifiers that do not yet have a
specific property. Identifiers can be represented as strings, but
using a `PropertyValue` will usually be better because it allows
for `propertyID` (i.e. the type of identifier).

anyOf.description: Execution of the node has been scheduled for some time in the future.
Execution of the node is pending.
Execution of the node has been skipped because it is unnecessary.
Execution of the node has been skipped because it has code, or other property, that is empty.
The node is currently being executed.
Execution of the node completed without warning, error, or exception messages.
Execution of the node completed but with warning messages.
Execution of the node completed but with error messages.
Execution of the node did not complete because there was an exception message.
Execution of the node was pending but was cancelled.
Execution of the node was running but was interrupted.
